ModMetaData.name: [1.3] Empire Tribute Honor Alien Autopatcher
ModMetaData.description:
Using Humanoid Alien Races, but the Empire doesn't give you any honor for your alien prisoners? This mod fixes that.
Race honor values are based on their base market value. Humans are worth $1750 and you get 3 honor for one. A race worth $875, half that amount, is now worth 1.5 honor, and so on. If a race already has an honor value, this mod will not overwrite that. (A Cutebold is still worth 1 honor even though their market value is $1250.)
This mod supports all HAR-based races automatically -- no asking or waiting for updates.
This mod should be placed after all race mods in your mod list.
ModMetaData.author: HeatherAthebyne
